channel.title: Need Urgent Help Please :(
channel.description:
Well ive been running my server for a few days now.. then all of sudden its just started not letting people connect I got a thing of what its saying in the run.bat
[code]Connection from 86.108.124.157.go.com.jo:27370 Connection from 21.40.28.78.cable.petrus.pl:9928 ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (21.40.28.78.cable.petrus.pl) Connection from 78.175.141.217:44223 ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (78.175.141.217) Connection from 200.35.163.98:1067 ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (200.35.163.98) Connection from 122.173.237.12:4502 ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (122.173.237.12) Connection from 122.167.67.82:4164 Connection reset java.net.SocketException: Connection reset at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(SocketInputStream.java:168) at client.fillInStream(client.java:8087) at client.run(client.java:17129) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (122.167.67.82) Disconnecting bugged player null java.lang.NullPointerException at stream.createFrame(stream.java:36) at client.closeInterface(client.java:7060) at client.declineDuel(client.java:332) at client.logout(client.java:9464) at PlayerHandler.saveGame(PlayerHandler.java:400) at PlayerHandler.removePlayer(PlayerHandler.java:392) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:279) at process.run(process.java:23) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) java.lang.NullPointerException at stream.createFrame(stream.java:36) at client.logout(client.java:9473) at PlayerHandler.saveGame(PlayerHandler.java:400) at PlayerHandler.removePlayer(PlayerHandler.java:392) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:279) at process.run(process.java:23) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (86.108.124.157.go.com.jo) socket closed java.net.SocketException: socket closed at java.net.SocketInputStream.socketRead0(Native Method) at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(SocketInputStream.java:129) at client.fillInStream(client.java:8087) at client.run(client.java:17129) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) Connection from 123.237.109.211:8866 ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (123.237.109.211) Connection from 190.18.180.56:30346 ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (190.18.180.56) Connection from 118.95.211.3:63147 ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (118.95.211.3) Connection from 122.173.237.12:4556 ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (122.173.237.12) Connection from 82.79.102.85:5561 Connection from 188.129.186.17:29643 ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (188.129.186.17)[/code]
Can someone help me with this please and tell me what to do? Rep to who helps! Thanks!

item.title: Need Urgent Help Please :(
item.dc:creator: @watch_n_lern watch n lern
item.description:
@watch_n_lern wrote:

off topic: you cant rep, you need 15 or more to rep.

on topic: try restarting your server. also make sure that ur DUC setup is on and working correctly.

Read full topic

item.title: Need Urgent Help Please :(
item.dc:creator: @durial12 durial12
item.description:
@durial12 wrote:

Maybe they are not using correct client? Or anti-leech.

Read full topic
